title: Innovative on-site colorimetric assay of tetracyclines by smartphones in waters and milks based on a synergistic co-catalyst FeMoO4@Fe7S8 with strong interactions and complexation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,4293-4308
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00587B, Paper
Jingjing Gu, Hailong Gong, Yuhao Li, Qinqin Ma, Xiaofeng Hou, Siyu Shen, Tingting Liu, Xuedong Wang
The synthesis of co-catalyst FeMoO4@Fe7S8 with strong interactions and complexation and the application of innovative on-site colorimetric assay of tetracyclines by smartphones in waters and milks.
